options.content: SnapMirror Destinations dashboard would show the Destination View of all the SnapMirror Relationships.

panels.title: Important Information about SnapMirror Destinations dashboard

panels.description: This panel displays volume relationship count based on the relationship health.
panels.title: Relationship Health Overview

panels.description: This panel displays volume relationship count based on the relationship type.
panels.title: Relationships by Protection Policy

panels.description: This panel displays detail of all the snapmirror relationships from destination side of view.
panels.title: Relationships

panels.description: This panel displays duration of the last SnapMirror transfer in seconds.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Relationships by Transfer Duration

panels.description: This panel displays amount of time since the last snapmirror transfer in seconds.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Relationships by Lag Time

panels.description: This panel displays size in kilobytes (1024 bytes) of the last transfer.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Relationships by Transfer Data

panels.description: This panel displays consistency group relationship count based on the relationship health.
panels.title: Consistency Group Relationship Health Overview

panels.description: This panel displays consistency group relationship count based on the relationship type.
panels.title: Consistency Group relationships by relationship type

panels.description: This panel displays detail of all Consistency Group relationships from destination side of view.
panels.title: Consistency Group Relationships

list.description: Select all the datacenters that contain the ONTAP clusters acting as source for SnapMirror relationships.
list.name: Datacenter
